# [ARCHIVE] Minerva Azure Control Details

### How to Use This Document

Below you will find detailed information for each released Minerva Azure control. Remediations for the controls are found below using both manual steps (console-based) and automated steps (Terraform-based). Follow the manual steps if you do not use Terraform to manage your resources, or add the Terraform configurations to your Terraform modules. For each control, irrelevant Terraform configuration details have been omitted with "...". **Please thoroughly test and adapt the Terraform configurations as needed**. If you would like to contribute to our community by refining the remediation steps, please reach out to us on slack [#sap-hyperscaler-security](https://sap-multi-cloud.slack.com/archives/C0122SCP6QN)

import controlsData from '../../../../data/json/old-sapAzure.json';
export const ControlsComponent = () => {
const controls1 = [...controlsData.controls]
const controls = controls1.sort((a, b) => a.id.localeCompare(b.id));

return (
<div>
{controls.map(control => (
<div key={control.id}>
<h3>Azure {control.title}</h3>
<p>Control ID: {control.id}</p>
<p>Control Severity: {control.impact}</p>
<p><a href={control.tags.sgs_wiki_url}>SAP Global Security Requirement Wiki</a></p>

          <h4>Control Description:</h4>
          <p>{control.desc}</p>

          <h4>Manual Remediation for {control.id}:</h4>
          {control.tags.remediation_steps ? (
            <p>{control.tags.remediation_steps}</p>
          ) : (
            <>
              <p>
                We are in the process of defining manual remediation steps for this control, please consult the policy defined in the <a href={control.tags.sgs_wiki_url}>SAP Global Security Requirement Wiki</a> in the mean-time.
              </p>
              <p>
                Please reach out to us on <a href="https://sap-multi-cloud.slack.com/archives/C0122SCP6QN">slack</a> if the remediation is not clear based on the policy.
              </p>
            </>
          )}

          <h4>Terraform Remediation for {control.id}</h4>
          {control.tags.terraform_remediation ? (
            <>
              {control.tags.tested_tf_version && (
                <p>This Terraform remediation has been tested with Terraform version {control.tags.tested_tf_version}</p>
              )}
              <pre>{control.tags.terraform_remediation}</pre>
              {control.tags.terraform_remediation_note && (
                <p>Note regarding this Terraform remediation: {control.tags.terraform_remediation_note}</p>
              )}
            </>
          ) : (
            <p>There is currently no Terraform remediation defined, please reach out to us on <a href="https://sap-multi-cloud.slack.com/archives/C0122SCP6QN">slack</a> if you believe Terraform could be used for remediation in this instance.</p>
          )}
        </div>
      ))}
    </div>

);
};

<ControlsComponent />
